photos.content:
Create a realistic portrait (100% like the face), High-quality. A young woman with long wavy dark brown hair smiling directly at the camera.
Attire and Accessories:
She is wearing a matching red and black horizontally striped ensemble, including a knee-length skirt and a draped, poncho-style top.
She wears a traditional headband adorned with feathers that features the text "IGOROT STONE KINGDOM" and a circular logo.
On her left wrist, she has a silver watch.
Pose: She stands with her arms crossed in front of her, centered in the frame.
The background is the Igorot Stone Kingdom, a large-scale attraction made of tiered, light-colored stone walls and towers.
Other tourists and a traditional statue can be seen in the distance, suggesting a popular park or landmark.
Lighting: The photo is taken in soft, diffused natural daylight, creating a clear and detailed view of the subject and the stonework. make it realistic Add a small handwritten-style watermark that reads ‘Prompt by: Salie Francia’.
